We have revised our Terms and Conditions of Use and our Privacy Policy. We are also changing the Spotify company responsible for providing you with our service to Spotify AB, a Swedish company. By clicking “Agree”, you consent to these updates and to the transfer of your contract to Spotify AB. Please take a few minutes to read and understand them.

a) the transfer of your contract from Spotify GmbH to Spotify AB,
b) the updates of the Terms and Conditions of Use, and
c) the collecting, processing and use of your personal data as described in Sections 4, 5, and 7 of the Privacy Policy.
